thread.title: SHIT-THROWER TARGETS PLAYGROUND IN TAMPINES

author: farhan
title: SHIT-THROWER TARGETS PLAYGROUND IN TAMPINES
text:
SHIT-THROWER TARGETS PLAYGROUND IN TAMPINES   
It's been raining shit in Tampines. Yes, literally. Advertisement 
It was reported that somebody has been throwing bags of shit from a high floor, aimed at a playground near Block 499A Tampinies St 45. 
The photo attached shows the poo stain. The marks show that it was thrown from a great height. 
Residents are understandingly, worried for their kids, themselves and their laundry. 
The last reported shit attack was on 2 Feb. Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
